org.jeo.tile

Class TileGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jeo.tile.TileGrid

  • public class TileGrid
extends Object
    Describes a tile matrix (grid).
    Author:
    Justin Deoliveira, OpenGeo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TileGrid(Integer z, Integer width, Integer height, Double xRes, Double yRes)
      Constructs a tile grid object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Integer height()
      The number of rows of the tile grid.
      Integer width()
      The number of columns of the tile grid.
      Double xres()
      The horizontal resolution of the tile grid.
      Double yres()
      The vertical resolution of the tile grid.
      Integer z()
      The z (zoom) level of the tile grid.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TileGrid

        public TileGrid(Integer z,
        Integer width,
        Integer height,
        Double xRes,
        Double yRes)
        Constructs a tile grid object.
        Parameters:
        z - Zoom level of the grid.
        width - Number of tiles horizontally in the grid.
        height - Number of tiles vertically in the grid.
        xRes - The x resolution of tiles.
        yRes - The y resolution of tiles.

    • Method Detail

      • z

        public Integer z()
        The z (zoom) level of the tile grid.

      • width

        public Integer width()
        The number of columns of the tile grid.

      • height

        public Integer height()
        The number of rows of the tile grid.

      • xres

        public Double xres()
        The horizontal resolution of the tile grid.

        More specifically the horizontal size of a single pixel in "map" units.

      • yres

        public Double yres()
        The vertical resolution of the tile grid.

        More specifically the vertical size of a single pixel in "map" units.
